1007 Maximum Subsequence Sum (25分)

解法一：线性扫描

太经典了就不说了

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>

int num, sum, max;
int start, end, index;
std::vector<int> array;

void parseInput() {
	std::cin >> num;
	array = std::vector<int>(num);
	for (int i = 0; i < num; i++) std::cin >> array[i];
}

void maxSubSequence() {
	sum = 0, max = array[0];
	start = 0, end = 0, index = array[0];
	for (int i = 0; i < num; i++) {
		sum += array[i];
		if (sum < 0) {
			sum = 0;
			index = i+1;
		}
		else if (sum > max) {
			max = sum;
			end = i;
			start = index;
		}
	}
}

int main() {
	parseInput();
	maxSubSequence();
	if (max < 0) 
		std::cout << 0 << " " << array[0] << " " << array[num - 1];
	else 
		std::cout << max << " " << array[start] << " " << array[end];
}

解法二：分治法

同样经典，但是麻烦一点，实战没必要这样做
